title: beach trip with sirius hc
body:
• this was all his idea
  • one day, after bursting into the room looking very ruffled, he plopped down and was like
  • “I have a plan.”
  • and you know that this usually entails something possibly dangerous and almost certainly reckless, so you were a little wary
  • “…and what might that be?”
  • “beach day”
  • and this was possibly the tamest thing he had ever suggested so you were even more cautious than before because something as innocent as a beach day sounded very suspicious
  • “a…. beach day?”
  • “I just…” and the usual glow fades from his eyes for the briefest moment but you still notice it “….have never really had one”
  • and you feel a gentle little tug on your heart
  • and right then and there you decide. you’re about to give sirius black the best damn beach day that there ever was.
  • “tomorrow, then?”
  • he looks a little surprised and says “you think we can organize it by then?”
  • “of course we can! don’t worry about it, I’ll get everything set up, just bring anything you want!”
  • and you’ve never seen him look so genuinely excited about anything
  • now, you may have jumped the gun just a bit, because you didn’t know exactly how you were going to make this the best beach day he’d ever had
  • but the weather had been beautiful the past few days and you knew it would still be beautiful then, so you at least had that on your side
  • so you began the quest of designing this day for him
  • you got all the basics: the towels, the umbrella, the picnic basket, the sunscreen, the books— anything you thought of, you nabbed
  • you tried your best to make a lunch and tried your hand at making lemonade, then packed everything away for tomorrow
  • by the time you felt like everything was in order, it was late
  • but you still got up early and packed everything up and met sirius
  • he was ready
  • he had a large bag filled with unknown items, but you didn’t ask what the contents were
  • all you knew was that he was happy
  • you didn’t think you had ever seen sirius look so giddy
  • “are you ready?”
  • “absolutely, love”
  • and off you went
  • you apparated to a nice beach that was secluded so you would be free to do whatever you liked
  • you set up the umbrella and the towels while sirius admired the view and sprinted through the gentle waves
  • watching him was truly the most joy you had ever felt
  • because he was just so grateful for everything
  • grateful especially for you, which he showed and expressed constantly
  • he was always telling you how much he appreciated you in general, but after the beach trip, he showed it by enjoying every single thing
  • “you’ve made the best lemonade I’ve ever had. I can’t believe it. what did you enchant this with”
  • “look at the water. have you ever seen such a view”
  • and the longer you observed, the more you realized
  • no one in his life had ever really cared for him before
  • there were his friends, of course, who had become more his family than his real family was
  • and there was you
  • and those were the only people who had ever truly loved him
  • he appreciated something as simple as a day at the beach more than you could ever imagine, simply because no one had ever gone out of their way to do something nice for him before
  • he was so used to doing things for himself and handling himself that being treated to anything was a miracle
  • that realization sent a twinge of pain down your back because sirius deserved so much better than that
  • he deserved the whole world
  • and you were going to give it to him
  • he sat down next to you after running as far as he could down the edge of the beach because the sand was infinitely entertaining to him
  • and you handed him his fourth glass of lemonade and he pressed a long kiss against your temple and scooped up your hand in his
  • “thank you, love”
  • you hummed quietly and grinned
  • “having a good time?”
  • he smiled, nodded, turned to look at the sea and said “the best time I could ever ask for.”

text:
Where is Nagini?” said a cold voice.
“I - I don’t know, my lord,” said the first voice nervously. “She set out to explore the house, I think…”
“You will milk her before we retire, Wormtail,” said the second voice. “I will need feeding in the night. The journey has tired me greatly.
source:
Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire (page 12)

This sounds even worse now that we know Nagini is now a cursed Asian woman.

summary:
My Pottermore
 [ENG]
 MY HOGWARTS HOUSE: Hufflepuff 
 MY PATRONUS: White Stallion 
 MY WAND: Hawthorn wood with a Phoenix...
caption:
My Pottermore

[ENG]
MY HOGWARTS HOUSE: Hufflepuff 
MY PATRONUS: White Stallion 
MY WAND: Hawthorn wood with a Phoenix feather core 11 ¾ and Hard flexibility 
MY ILVERMORNY HOUSE: Thunderbird

I’m not really a Harry Potter fan. I did not read a single book and watched only 4 films. But I really love the Harry Potter universe, especially the distribution. Although all people are different and it’s wrong to divide them into only 4 faculties, I still love such things and they are interesting to me.
So I passed the Pottermore quizze. I am sure that he does not give a 100% result and this is an absolute random, but still nice or not(It is depend of result).
The first time I passed the quizze, I was assigned to Slytherin. The only reason I ended up there was probably my asshole character (I don’t think that only bad and evil people study in Slytherin, I just have no other explanation).
A year later, I passed the quizze again. Let it does not reflect my essence, but I am happy. Hufflepuff is one of my favorite faculties (also Ravenclaw) and I’m glad I’m there now.
I am more or less satisfied with my patronus. White Stallion… it sounds beautiful and noble. Right?
I am very strange because I love beautiful and cute things. Therefore, I want an attractive patronus. Strength is not important to me. We will fight the dementors using our charming and deadly smile, haha. 
But my wand is really cool. It seems to me that it suits me. My character is as complex and controversial as the hawthorn wood. And the flexibility of the wand shows that I adapt poorly and hate changes, I am not ready for them. And the phoenix feather … It is rare, and I love rare things. We have found each other!

❤_❤_❤_❤_❤_❤_❤_❤_❤_❤_❤_❤_❤_❤_❤_❤_❤

[RUS]
МОЙ ФАКУЛЬТЕТ В ХОГВАРТСЕ: Хаффлпафф
МОЙ ПАТРОНУС: Белый жеребец
ПАЛОЧКА: Древесина боярышника с сердцевиной из перьев феникса 11 ¾ и жесткой гибкостью
МОЙ ФАКУЛЬТЕТ В ИЛЬВЕРМОРНИ: Буревестник

Я на самом деле не фанат Гарри Поттера. Я не прочиталa ни одной книги и посмотрела только 4 фильма. Но я действительно люблю эту вселенную, особенно распределения. Хоть все люди разные, и неправильно делить их только на 4 факультета, я все равно люблю такие вещи, и они мне интересны.
Итак, я прошла тест на Pottermore. Я уверена, что он не дает 100% результата, и это абсолютно случайно, но мне все равно здорово или нет (это зависит от результата).
В первый раз, когда я проходила тест, меня назначили на Слизерин. Единственной причиной, по которой я там оказалась, был, вероятно, мой ужасный характер (я не думаю, что в Слизерине учатся только плохие и злые люди, у меня просто нет других объяснений).
Год спустя я снова прошла тест. Пусть он не отражает мою сущность, но я довольно. Хаффлпафф - один из моих любимых факультетов (еще Рейвенкло), и я рада, что я оказалась там.
Я более или менее довольна своим патронусом. “Белый жеребец” звучит красиво и благородно. Так ведь?
Я очень странный человек, потому что люблю красивые и милые вещи. Поэтому я хочу привлекательного патрона. А его сила совсем не важна для меня. Мы будем бороться против дементоров нашей обворожительно убийственной улыбкой, хах. 
Но моя палочка действительно классная. Мне кажется, что она подходит мне. Мой характер такой же сложный и противоречивый, как боярышник. А гибкость палочки показывает, что я плохо приспосабливаюсь и ненавижу изменения, я к ним не готов. И перо феникса … Оно редкое, а я люблю редкие вещи. Мы нашли друг друга!

[RUS]
МОЙ ФАКУЛЬТЕТ В ХОГВАРТСЕ: Хаффлпафф
МОЙ ПАТРОНУС: Белый жеребец
ПАЛОЧКА: Древесина боярышника с сердцевиной из перьев феникса 11 ¾ и жесткой гибкостью
МОЙ ФАКУЛЬТЕТ В ИЛЬВЕРМОРНИ: Буревестник

Я на самом деле не фанат Гарри Поттера. Я не прочиталa ни одной книги и посмотрела только 4 фильма. Но я действительно люблю эту вселенную, особенно распределения. Хоть все люди разные, и неправильно делить их только на 4 факультета, я все равно люблю такие вещи, и они мне интересны.
Итак, я прошла тест на Pottermore. Я уверена, что он не дает 100% результата, и это абсолютно случайно, но мне все равно здорово или нет (это зависит от результата).
В первый раз, когда я проходила тест, меня назначили на Слизерин. Единственной причиной, по которой я там оказалась, был, вероятно, мой ужасный характер (я не думаю, что в Слизерине учатся только плохие и злые люди, у меня просто нет других объяснений).
Год спустя я снова прошла тест. Пусть он не отражает мою сущность, но я довольно. Хаффлпафф - один из моих любимых факультетов (еще Рейвенкло), и я рада, что я оказалась там.
Я более или менее довольна своим патронусом. “Белый жеребец” звучит красиво и благородно. Так ведь?
Я очень странный человек, потому что люблю красивые и милые вещи. Поэтому я хочу привлекательного патрона. А его сила совсем не важна для меня. Мы будем бороться против дементоров нашей обворожительно убийственной улыбкой, хах. 
Но моя палочка действительно классная. Мне кажется, что она подходит мне. Мой характер такой же сложный и противоречивый, как боярышник. А гибкость палочки показывает, что я плохо приспосабливаюсь и ненавижу изменения, я к ним не готов. И перо феникса … Оно редкое, а я люблю редкие вещи. Мы нашли друг друга!

MY PATRONUS: White Stallion 
MY WAND: Hawthorn wood with a Phoenix feather core 11 ¾ and Hard flexibility 
MY ILVERMORNY HOUSE: Thunderbird

I’m not really a Harry Potter fan. I did not read a single book and watched only 4 films. But I really love the Harry Potter universe, especially the distribution. Although all people are different and it’s wrong to divide them into only 4 faculties, I still love such things and they are interesting to me.
So I passed the Pottermore quizze. I am sure that he does not give a 100% result and this is an absolute random, but still nice or not(It is depend of result).
The first time I passed the quizze, I was assigned to Slytherin. The only reason I ended up there was probably my asshole character (I don’t think that only bad and evil people study in Slytherin, I just have no other explanation).
A year later, I passed the quizze again. Let it does not reflect my essence, but I am happy. Hufflepuff is one of my favorite faculties (also Ravenclaw) and I’m glad I’m there now.
I am more or less satisfied with my patronus. White Stallion… it sounds beautiful and noble. Right?
I am very strange because I love beautiful and cute things. Therefore, I want an attractive patronus. Strength is not important to me. We will fight the dementors using our charming and deadly smile, haha. 
But my wand is really cool. It seems to me that it suits me. My character is as complex and controversial as the hawthorn wood. And the flexibility of the wand shows that I adapt poorly and hate changes, I am not ready for them. And the phoenix feather … It is rare, and I love rare things. We have found each other!

summary: Tom Riddle x Reader pt.3 AU: “I like you Tom, but its just..”, i say softly. I didn’t know what to say, his face just wanted me...
body:
Tom Riddle x Reader pt.3

AU:

“I like you Tom, but its just..”, i say softly.

I didn’t know what to say, his face just wanted me to kiss him again but I couldn’t.

Instead, I walked out up to my room in confusion.

I heard his footsteps behind me, “Wait! Y/N.”

“Tom you can’t come up here. Just let me be by myself for a while.”, i sob.

He stands still at the bottom of the stairs, looking up at me, “What did I do? Please tell me and i’ll work something out.”

His voice was shaky, he seemed upset. He wanted me.

I sigh, “I think.. I’m just a bit frazzled because of my parents and my mindset isn’t just as great at the moment.”

“I know.. I just wanna be with you. Take care of you.”, his plastered a smile on his face.

My heart started to warm up, he wanted to be with me? “Do you really mean that?”, i raised my eyebrow.

“Y/N.. ever since we became close, I had a feeling that I needed you beside me, and as well as protect you.”, he awed.

Nothing stood in the way of me running up to him and kissing him, it just all happened so fast.

No one has ever said those things to me, let alone Tom Riddle.

He wrapped his arms around my waist as i latched my legs around him.

He held me close and tight, his kiss was even more passionate than our first.

I think I love him.

Being with Tom Riddle felt like a thrill ride, he was dangerous and charming, but so loving towards me.

We couldn’t tell anyone that we were dating, it’ll break the rules.

It was our little secret.

Tom joined this exclusive group called “Slug Club” as bad as it sounds, apparently its not that bad. Its run by Professor Slughorn, he honestly loves Tom; praises him. Tom has been getting straight A’s in all his subjects, its unbelievable. But I have to give him props, he is a genius.

But there is something about Tom that is dangerous. He can speak parseltone, one that only a descendant from Salazar Slytherin can achieve. He discovered something so very amazing but infamous about Hogwarts, only he told me about. A place where we only know, a place no one else cannot know. 

I don’t know how he found out about it, but he did.

Called it the Chamber of Secrets.

~~~

It’s been a month since we’ve started dating, and no one has noticed, nor i have known. We don’t even give off anything that might seem fishy.

Tom started to talk me into making me his wife when we’re older. He already “pre-proposed” to me; if thats even a thing. I was confused, i mean, its too soon. But i do really like him.

He also said something about horcruxes, how a horcrux is a step to having immortality. 

The other day he showed me this old-looking leather book, 

“This, will be my first ever horcrux. You, my darling will not tell anyone about, because I trust you.”, he said softly.

I was amazed. Tom told me that horcruxes, how only dark wizards and witches can create.

This made me think to believe Tom might be evil.

Tom Riddle? Evil? Nope, not in my mind.

He held my hand everyday. Kissed me on the forehead before going to bed. Shared me his food in the Great Hall. Helped me with homework. How can he be evil?

But, as it said in the book, many dark wizards and witches have created horcruxes. And Prof. Slughorn was surprised he’d even have an interest in that. And the fact that, Tom wanted to have seven different horcruxes.

But I also don’t get why its an evil thing…

~~~

I watch Tom on the other side of the couch, fiddling with his ring.

Damn he’s cute.

I quickly hover over him, giving him a kiss.

His kisses are so special, his smile blooms everytime i pull away.

“Maybe we should keep our kisses down at the Chamber of Secrets.”, he smirks.

“Oh who cares anymore honestly.”, i smirk back.

“True.”, he smiles and climbs on top of me.

Kissing me all down my neck. His lips, like marshmallows, but like a cold snap. Sending tingles down to my entrance.

We both then hear footsteps coming, Tom continues to pin me down by forcefully kissing me. I try to pull away but he couldn’t budge. 

It felt as if he was eating my mouth, it started to hurt.

“What’s going on here!?”, the prefect for Slytherin yells.

I push Tom away, falling onto the ground.

“You know this kind of behaviour is unacceptable here. Keep it out of Hogwarts or you both will be spending detention for a long time.”, he shouted.

“So you don’t accept this.”, Tom smiles as he gropes my leg.

“Get your hands off her this instance or else I’m going to have to strip away points from this house!”, the prefect continues.

I, for some reason didn’t get scared. I wanted Tom to keep provoking him.

“Strip away?”, he smirks as he rips my blouse apart, exposing my breasts.

I start laughing hysterically.

“That’s it! I’ve had enough! Off to the headmistresses office now!”, he yells.

Tom and I get up and walk to her office. The prefect grabbing my arm, “I suggest you change your shirt. You don’t want to get suspended huh.”, he growls.

“Get your hands off her. Filthy mud-blood.”, Tom clenches his jaw.

The prefect lets go and walks away to the corridors.

“Did he hurt you?”, Tom assured me.

I shake my head and he places his hand behind my head and brings me to his chest.

I felt safe with Tom, like he was my protector.

Kissing me all down my neck. His lips, like marshmallows, but like a cold snap. Sending tingles down to my entrance.

We both then hear footsteps coming, Tom continues to pin me down by forcefully kissing me. I try to pull away but he couldn’t budge. 

It felt as if he was eating my mouth, it started to hurt.

“What’s going on here!?”, the prefect for Slytherin yells.

I push Tom away, falling onto the ground.

“You know this kind of behaviour is unacceptable here. Keep it out of Hogwarts or you both will be spending detention for a long time.”, he shouted.

“So you don’t accept this.”, Tom smiles as he gropes my leg.

“Get your hands off her this instance or else I’m going to have to strip away points from this house!”, the prefect continues.

I, for some reason didn’t get scared. I wanted Tom to keep provoking him.

“Strip away?”, he smirks as he rips my blouse apart, exposing my breasts.

I start laughing hysterically.

“That’s it! I’ve had enough! Off to the headmistresses office now!”, he yells.

Tom and I get up and walk to her office. The prefect grabbing my arm, “I suggest you change your shirt. You don’t want to get suspended huh.”, he growls.

“Get your hands off her. Filthy mud-blood.”, Tom clenches his jaw.

The prefect lets go and walks away to the corridors.

“Did he hurt you?”, Tom assured me.

I shake my head and he places his hand behind my head and brings me to his chest.

I felt safe with Tom, like he was my protector.

summary: Thanks to the recent sub quest...
title: Thanks to the recent sub quest...
body:
Rowan: Saffron? I’ve noticed you’ve haven’t spoken to Tulip for weeks.

Saffron: So?

Rowan: So shouldn’t you two make up? She apologised, didn’t she?

Saffron: *glare* Her apology isn’t enough. It will never be enough. Rowan, she never cared for me. She only wanted Dennis to be in the choir and would even ask Merula if she won. Hell, I bet she’d asked anyone in the choir to be Dennis’s partner.

Rowan: Saffron... 

Saffron: *sighs* I’m done. I’m done with Merula. I’m done with Tulip... and I’m done with you.

Rowan: *shocked* W-What did I do?!

Saffron: Saying that your enemy has a voice of a siren’s isn’t very encouraging. You never did encouraged me. Only became my study partner.

Rowan: *sobs* Saffron, I-I’m sorry! I didn’t mean it!

Saffron: I’m through with friends. I’m cutting everyone off and find Jacob myself.

summary: The Potters are dead; in the wake of tragedy, both Dumbledore and Lord Voldemort have gone missing. Despite the disappearance of...
caption:
The Potters are dead; in the wake of tragedy, both Dumbledore and Lord Voldemort have gone missing. Despite the disappearance of their Dark Lord, the Death Eaters have continued to increase in both size and authority, and have infiltrated the Ministry. Causalities – Muggle and Wixen alike – are a daily occurrence. International wizarding governments ceased all trade with the United Kingdom, in hopes of deterring further war crimes. In retaliation, the UK closed its borders. Non-British Wixen find themselves stuck, unable to return home from overseas work or vacation. Now, foreign agents are being snuck in to offer aid and investigate on their country’s behalf. Any spy discovered is immediately thrown into Azkaban, with their memory obliviated. War seems inevitable – however, battle against the world scarcely intimidates the Death Eaters, leaving many to wonder what exactly they have up their sleeves.

obliviate is a member-driven, no word count roleplay with a freeform application. brand new to the scene, we offer a vast variety of faces and canons! come say hello on our discord.

summary: I dreamed you wrote a Harry Potter coraline au. nagini replaced the cat and Riddle was the other mother. Aunt marge was wretched...
question: I dreamed you wrote a Harry Potter coraline au. nagini replaced the cat and Riddle was the other mother. Aunt marge was wretched shaving Harry’s head before the move to the pink palace saying a poorly kept mutt reflects on the owner making him bleed in the process. Hair grew back but he was traumatized enough by it that Harry always wore a hat in it. I remember it was you because I found it after catching up on cs. Sorry if that was random but even in my dreams I enjoy your writing it seems XD
answer:
I’m both flattered and amused, darling. Definitely sounds like an interesting story idea - especially with the whole souls thing. Sounds like something Tom would do. 

Oooohhh - how ‘bout The Pink Palace used to be the orphanage he grew up in, but Tom died in there before he got to 18 and/or adopted, so he’s been trapped in the other realm for so long. He steals the souls of the children that move in there in either the hopes of “taking their place” and finally having a family, or keeping them with him in some creepy Peter Pan/Lost Boys scenarios. Then poor little Harry stumbles upon the Other World and things spiral from there. Me likey.
